patthana12.13:4.7: nanabhāvanāya pahātabbaṃ nahetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca … pe …

patthana12.13:5.1: Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe dve … pe … vipāke ekaṃ … pe … avigate pañca.
patthana12.13:7.1: Hetuyā nava … pe … purejāte āsevane cha … pe … avigate nava.
patthana12.13:9.1: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe cattāri, adhipatiyā pañca … pe … aññamaññe cha … pe … purejāte āsevane dve … pe … avigate nava.

patthana12.13:14.1: Nasaraṇaṃ nahetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasaraṇo nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. #1
patthana12.13:15.1: Naaraṇaṃ nahetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naaraṇo nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana12.13:15.2: Naaraṇaṃ nahetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasaraṇo nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana12.13:15.3: Naaraṇaṃ nahetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasaraṇo nahetu ca naaraṇo nahetu ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. #3
patthana12.13:16.1: Nasaraṇaṃ nahetuñca naaraṇaṃ nahetuñca dhammaṃ paṭicca nasaraṇo nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana12.13:17.1: Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe dve … pe … vipāke ekaṃ … pe … avigate pañca.
patthana12.13:18.1: Nasaraṇaṃ nanahetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasaraṇo nanahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. #1
patthana12.13:19.1: Naaraṇaṃ nanahetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naaraṇo nanahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana12.13:20.1: Hetuyā dve … pe … vipāke ekaṃ … pe … avigate dve.
